trans-unit.source: Identify the default language
trans-unit.target: Identify the default language

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer uses the system speech language as its default recognition language.
trans-unit.target: A speech recognizer uses the system speech language as its default recognition language.

trans-unit.source: This language is set by the user on the device Settings > System > Speech > Speech Language screen.
trans-unit.target: This language is set by the user on the device Settings > System > Speech > Speech Language screen.

trans-unit.source: We identify the default language by checking the [**SystemSpeechLanguage**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653252) static property.
trans-unit.target: We identify the default language by checking the [**SystemSpeechLanguage**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653252) static property.

trans-unit.source: Confirm an installed language
trans-unit.target: Confirm an installed language

trans-unit.source: Installed languages can vary between devices.
trans-unit.target: Installed languages can vary between devices.

trans-unit.source: You should verify the existence of a language if you depend on it for a particular constraint.
trans-unit.target: You should verify the existence of a language if you depend on it for a particular constraint.

trans-unit.source: **Note** A reboot is required after a new language pack is installed.
trans-unit.target: **Note** A reboot is required after a new language pack is installed.

trans-unit.source: An exception with error code SPERR\_NOT\_FOUND (0x8004503a) is raised if the specified language is not supported or has not finished installing.
trans-unit.target: An exception with error code SPERR\_NOT\_FOUND (0x8004503a) is raised if the specified language is not supported or has not finished installing.

trans-unit.source: Determine the supported languages on a device by checking one of two static properties of the [**SpeechRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653226) class:
trans-unit.target: Determine the supported languages on a device by checking one of two static properties of the [**SpeechRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653226) class:

trans-unit.source: [**SupportedTopicLanguages**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653251)—The collection of [**Language**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br206804) objects used with predefined dictation and web search grammars.
trans-unit.target: [**SupportedTopicLanguages**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653251)—The collection of [**Language**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br206804) objects used with predefined dictation and web search grammars.

trans-unit.source: [**SupportedGrammarLanguages**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653250)—The collection of [**Language**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br206804) objects used with a list constraint or a Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) file.
trans-unit.target: [**SupportedGrammarLanguages**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653250)—The collection of [**Language**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br206804) objects used with a list constraint or a Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) file.

trans-unit.source: Specify a language
trans-unit.target: Specify a language

trans-unit.source: To specify a language, pass a [**Language**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br206804) object in the [**SpeechRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653226) constructor.
trans-unit.target: To specify a language, pass a [**Language**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br206804) object in the [**SpeechRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653226) constructor.

trans-unit.source: Here, we specify "en-US" as the recognition language.
trans-unit.target: Here, we specify "en-US" as the recognition language.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: A topic constraint can be configured by adding a [**SpeechRecognitionTopicConstraint**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn631446) to the [**Constraints**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653241) collection of the [**SpeechRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653226) and then calling [**CompileConstraintsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653240).
trans-unit.target: A topic constraint can be configured by adding a [**SpeechRecognitionTopicConstraint**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn631446) to the [**Constraints**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653241) collection of the [**SpeechRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653226) and then calling [**CompileConstraintsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653240).

trans-unit.source: A [**SpeechRecognitionResultStatus**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn631433) of **TopicLanguageNotSupported** is returned if the recognizer is not initialized with a supported topic language.
trans-unit.target: A [**SpeechRecognitionResultStatus**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn631433) of **TopicLanguageNotSupported** is returned if the recognizer is not initialized with a supported topic language.

trans-unit.source: A list constraint is configured by adding a [**SpeechRecognitionListConstraint**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn631421) to the [**Constraints**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653241) collection of the [**SpeechRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653226) and then calling [**CompileConstraintsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653240).
trans-unit.target: A list constraint is configured by adding a [**SpeechRecognitionListConstraint**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn631421) to the [**Constraints**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653241) collection of the [**SpeechRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653226) and then calling [**CompileConstraintsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653240).

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify the language of a custom list directly.
trans-unit.target: You cannot specify the language of a custom list directly.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the list will be processed using the language of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Instead, the list will be processed using the language of the recognizer.

trans-unit.source: An SRGS grammar is an open-standard XML format represented by the [**SpeechRecognitionGrammarFileConstraint**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn631412) class.
trans-unit.target: An SRGS grammar is an open-standard XML format represented by the [**SpeechRecognitionGrammarFileConstraint**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn631412) class.

trans-unit.source: Unlike custom lists, you can specify the language of the grammar in the SRGS markup.
trans-unit.target: Unlike custom lists, you can specify the language of the grammar in the SRGS markup.

trans-unit.source: [**CompileConstraintsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653240) fails with a [**SpeechRecognitionResultStatus**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn631433) of **TopicLanguageNotSupported** if the recognizer is not initialized to the same language as the SRGS markup.
trans-unit.target: [**CompileConstraintsAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn653240) fails with a [**SpeechRecognitionResultStatus**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn631433) of **TopicLanguageNotSupported** if the recognizer is not initialized to the same language as the SRGS markup.
